text: Ani musa yanni du'a- prarthana keli, he majhya palanahara! Tu, phira'auna ani tyacya saradaranna sobha sajavata ani sarva prakaraci dhana-daulata ya jagacya jivanata pradana keli. He amacya palanakartya! (Asasathi pradana keli) ki tyanni tujhya margapasuna amhala dura karave. He amacya palanakartya! Tyancya dhana-daulatila udâ€Œdhvasta karuna taka ani tyancya hrdayanna sakta (kathora) banava, yasathi ki tyanna imana rakhane asakya vhave, yethaparyanta ki tyanni duhkhadayaka azaba (siksa-yatana) pahuna ghyavi
